name: Jalapeño-Glazed Ham Steak

ingredients.name: red
ingredients.original_string: 2  tablespoons red or amber jalapeño pepper jelly

ingredients.name: chopped fresh cilantro
ingredients.original_string: 2  tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, if desired
1  (1-lb.) slice fully cooked center-cut ham slice (1/2 inch thick)

instructions: Heat grill. Place jelly in small microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on HIGH for 30 seconds. Add cilantro; stir to mix well. Pat ham dry with paper towel.

When ready to grill, place ham slice on gas grill over medium heat or on charcoal grill 4 to 6 inches from medium coals. Brush ham with half of glaze; cook 5 to 7 minutes or until thoroughly heated, turning and brushing with remaining glaze during last 2 minutes of cooking time.
